title: Car Nicobarese (1918) Mark
description: Car Nicobarese translation of Gospel of Mark published by the British and Foreign Bible Society in 1918. Car is the most widely spoken of the Nicobarese languages spoken in the Nicobar Islands of India. Although related distantly to Vietnamese and Khmer, it is typologically much more akin to nearby Austronesian languages such as Nias and Acehnese, with which it forms a linguistic area.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society
